description: Structured information describing a coordinate space.

alias._instruction: Enter the user-defined identifier for this coordinate space (e.g. a short name).

anatomicalOrientation._instruction: Add the axes orientation denoted in standard anatomical terms of direction (in 2D or 3D).

defaultImages._instruction: Add one or several images used as visual representation in this coordinate space.

fullName._instruction: Enter a descriptive name for this coordinate space.

origin._instruction: Enter the origin of the coordinate system (central point where axes intersect; 2D, with z = 0).

relatedOntology._instruction: Enter the identifier (IRI) of the related ontological term that best describes this coordinate space.

releaseDate._instruction: Enter the date of first broadcast/publication/release of this coordinate space.

unit._instruction: Add the unit that is used for this coordinate space.

versionIdentifier._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this coordinate space.
